---
title: Serve
description: Starts the arsenic HTTP API
---

```
arsenic serve [flags]
```

## Options

```
  -h, --help          help for serve
  -H, --hugo string   The path to the hugo directory
  -p, --port int      The port to listen on (default 7433)
```
